ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Lvl 20 - 24 hunting grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: check out www.eqnecro.com.  This site has a ton of info for necros including a level guide as to where to hunt. ... From: Nat Russo
ygData.messageBody:
check out www.eqnecro.com. This site has a ton of info for necros including
a level guide as to where to hunt.

-----Original Message-----
From: Nat Russo [mailto:nrusso@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 16, 2000 2:17 PM
To: EQ_Necromancers
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Lvl 20 - 24 hunting grounds


From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>

Hi folks,

Just curious..... I hit lvl 20 finally and was wondering if there are any
recommended hunting grounds that are xp-heavy. I'm ok on loot at the moment
and just want to gain that precious xp.

Thanks in advance,
Mujahid
